course_title: Special Topics in Mission: Global Methodist Movement
class_notes: (AUGUST TERM ENROLLMENT ENDED JULY 15) (This course aims to help students understand the Methodist mission movement from Wesley to the global community it is today. "With over 80 Methodist, Wesleyan and related Uniting and United Churches representing over 80 million members in 138 countries," Methodism have always adapted to the communities and cultures where they exist. Learn about adaptations in mission of the past, present and discover possibilities for the future of mission in Methodism.)
course_description: Special topic or one-time offering courses led by Candler regular and visiting faculty. Prerequisites may be required and are noted on the course schedule when applicable.
schedule_location: MTWThF 1:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_447
